comprehensive_overview: pybind11 is a lightweight header-only library that enables seamless interoperability between C++11 or later and Python. It provides a simple and concise way to expose C++ functions and classes to Python, making it easy to write Python bindings for existing C++ code.
core_features: Seamless interoperability between C++ and Python
Supports Python 2 and 3 as well as CPython and PyPy interpreters
Flexible and efficient conversion of data types
